injury.name: Dizzy
injury.description: * While you have Dizziness, you cannot be Wise. * You have Penalty on all "Wise" skills. * In your first round of combat, discard 1 card. * After two nights of rest, remove Dizzy. * Take 2 Corruption Points to instantly heal Dizzy.
injury.flavor: You've been spun around one too many times.
